name: James Clear
bio: Author of 'Atomic Habits' and expert in habit formation and productivity.

name: Eric Ries
bio: Author of 'The Lean Startup' and advocate for continuous innovation in business.

name: Yuval Noah Harari
bio: Historian and author of 'Sapiens' and 'Homo Deus,' exploring the history and future of humankind.

name: Stephen R. Covey
bio: Author of 'The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People,' focusing on leadership and personal change.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: Author of the 'Harry Potter' series, one of the best-selling book franchises in history.

name: George R.R. Martin
bio: Author of 'A Song of Ice and Fire,' the epic fantasy series adapted into 'Game of Thrones.'

name: Malcolm Gladwell
bio: Author of 'Outliers,' 'Blink,' and 'The Tipping Point,' known for his works on sociology and psychology.

name: Dale Carnegie
bio: Author of 'How to Win Friends and Influence People,' a timeless classic on interpersonal skills.

name: Napoleon Hill
bio: Author of 'Think and Grow Rich,' a foundational book on personal development and success.
